short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Penguin Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Penguin background. Cute Penguin wallpaper background themes for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Highlights:

1. Enjoy a fresh Penguin wallpaper with every new tab with the shuffle feature.
2. Customize your Penguin background effortlessly by toggling between random selection and favoriting options.
3. Seamlessly integrate Google Search right from your browser's toolbar.
4. Stay connected with quick links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Stay updated with automatic display of current date and time.
6. Utilize the handy New Note feature for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Access your frequently visited websites with ease.
8. Organize your browsing experience with convenient access to bookmarks.
9. Personalize your browsing experience by adding websites to the Shortcut panel for instant access.
10. Access Google apps swiftly for enhanced productivity.
11. Explore a variety of themes with just a click through the More Themes option.
12. Quick access to social sharing.
13. Download wallpapers in a snap with quick access functionality.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Spruce up your Penguin new tab experience with animated elements like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks.
